results.name: Blinx 2: Masters of Time and Space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5 (or better)
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1050Ti / AMD RX570 with 3Gb memory (or better)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7000 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: I5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gts250
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

Minimum:
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP3 / Vista / 7 / 8
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo 2.0GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GT or better w /512MB VRAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL compatible
  • Additional Notes: Only one button is needed to control your character. Standard PC keyboard allows max 4 players to enjoy the game simultaneously. Controller is also supported in game, mind that you need mouse for menu navigation.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP SP3 / Vista / 7 / 8
  • Processor: Core i3 / Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 550 or better w /1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL compatible
  • Additional Notes: Only one button is needed to control your character. Standard PC keyboard allows max 4 players to enjoy the game simultaneously. Controller is also supported in game, mind that you need mouse for menu navigation.
